languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception and Agility, and +250% Damage
At the beggining of the round all allies exept familiars gain 2 stacks of Bait.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception and Agility, and +250% Damage
At the beggining of the round all allies exept familiars gain 2 stacks of Bait.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all allied characters gain 2 stacks of the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} все союзные персонажи получают 2 уровня эффекта {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманка{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} все дружественные персонажи получают 2 уровня эффекта {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманка{/g}.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーイーグルは +20 の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}を得て、ダメージが +250%増加する。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の開始時に、すべての味方は{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}餌{/g}効果を2スタック得る。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all allied characters gain 2 stacks of the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーイーグルは +20 の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}を得て、ダメージが +250%増加する。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の開始時に、すべての味方は{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}餌{/g}効果を2スタック得る。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Außerdem verursacht er +250 % Schaden.
Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhalten alle verbündeten Charaktere 2 Stapel des {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Köder{/g}-Effektes.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Außerdem verursacht er +250 % Schaden.
Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhalten alle verbündeten Charaktere 2 Stapel des {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Köder{/g}-Effektes.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Tüm dost karakterler, her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başında 2 {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}yem{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote.
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +20 et inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les personnages alliés gagnent 2 cumuls de l'effet {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Appât{/g}.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot

Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les personnages alliés gagnent 2 cumuls de l'effet {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Appât{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los personajes aliados ganan 2 acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}cebo{/g}.

Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los personajes aliados ganan 2 acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}cebo{/g}.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高250%。
每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，所有友方角色获得2层{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}诱饵{/g}效果。
